H1.name: Nikki's Pinky
H1.description: Nikki's favorite hairstyle. It shines wherever she goes!

H4.name: Sporty Teenager
H4.description: He is good at almost every sport. He never quits and he is the symbol of persistence.

H5.name: Untamed Heart
H5.description: He is always the center of attention but his eyes seem to gaze aimlessly into the crowds.

H6.name: Rising Star
H6.description: The bright spotlight only follows him and the screaming crowds cry only for him.

H7.name: Elegant Nobleman
H7.description: A gentle, thoughtful nobleman is not supposed to be the silent background forever.

H8.name: Brother Next Door
H8.description: He helps you with homework, looks after your house...Ordinary he may be, but he is irreplaceable.

H9.name: Snow Wolf
H9.description: No one knows where he is from. Only time will reveal the answer.

H10.name: Perfect Senior
H10.description: As the straight-A president of the student union, he always rejects the advances of fawning girls.

H11.name: Mysterious Guest
H11.description: He shows up quietly at midnight and leaves without saying goodbye after a hasty encounter.

H12.name: Fantasy Emissary
H12.description: With an impulsive character and the ability to control magic, he is both weird and funny.

H13.name: Scientist
H13.description: It seems that this weird man can read minds. You need to be careful of him.

H14.name: Coffee Shop Owner
H14.description: Smelling of coffee, he is like a cup of mellow latte. Everyone wants to have a taste of him.

H16.name: Silver-wings Hero

H20.name: Pinky-white Curls

H22.name: Dark-blue Curls

H23.name: Teddy Bear·Brown

H24.name: Teddy Bear·Pink

H25.name: Teddy Bear·Black

H26.name: Floating Kite·Blue

H28.name: Floating Kite·White
